## Radiant: Business analytics using R and Shiny

Interactive business analytics using [R](http://www.r-project.org/) and [Shiny](http[://www.rstudio.com/shiny/). Developed by [Vincent Nijs]("http://rady.ucsd.edu/faculty/directory/nijs/"). You can reach me at radiant@rady.ucsd.edu. Full source code for Radiant is available at <https://github.com/mostly-harmless/radiant>.
